name: io.github.slimslenderslacks/mcp-logseq
title: MCP Logseq Server
description: Model Context Protocol server providing programmatic access to Logseq graphs via SQLite queries and HTTP API. Exposes tools for querying tasks, creating/updating tasks, and resources for task data with automatic change notifications.

runtimeArguments.name: --mount
runtimeArguments.description: Mount Logseq graphs directory into the container

graphs_path.description: Absolute path to the directory containing Logseq graphs on the host machine

environmentVariables.name: LOGSEQ_API_HOST
environmentVariables.description: Hostname where Logseq HTTP API is accessible (default: host.docker.internal for Docker Desktop)

environmentVariables.name: LOGSEQ_API_PORT
environmentVariables.description: Port where Logseq HTTP API is listening

environmentVariables.name: LOGSEQ_API_AUTHORIZATION_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Authorization token for Logseq HTTP API (required if authentication is enabled in Logseq settings)
